DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluated the efficacy and safety of Avastin (bevacizumab, 5 mg/kg intravenously every 2 weeks) in patients with multiple myeloma, relapsed/refractory after at least 2 lines of prior therapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, 1975 years of age Multiple myeloma. Progressive disease after at least 2 lines of prior therapy. Nonsecretory myeloma. History of malignancy, other than squamous cell cancer, basal cell cancer, or cancer in situ of the cervix within the last 5 years. Major surgical procedure, open biopsy, or significant traumatic injury within 28 days prior to study treatment start. Clinically significant cardiac disease.
